items.content_html: NFTs and copyright, both do the same thing - establish a connection between the asset and the creator, providing them with ownership over their work, and enabling uniqueness. The only difference being that NFTs are not (yet) recognized by law.

items.content_html: Google News indexed all newspapers and made every local newspaper compete against every other. This killed newspapers that didn't do real reporting. The DeFi matrix will make every digital asset compete against every other. It will work as a check on the power of institutions that control fiat.
